text: Edwin Douglas Charles (April 29, 1933 – March 15, 2018) was an American professional baseball third baseman in Major League Baseball. He was a right- handed hitter, Charles played for the Kansas City Athletics (1962–67) and New York Mets (1967–69). Charles died on March 15, 2018 in New York City at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:African-American baseball players Category:Kansas City Athletics players Category:New York Mets players Category:Sportspeople from Florida
title: Ed Charles
